name: Avel Flight School
about: Avel Flight School, located at Schaumburg Regional Airport in Chicago, is a world-renowned flight training organization known for its high standards and safety protocols that surpass FAA and ICAO requirements. Our faculty consists of highly trained, FAA-certified instructors with excellent communication skills and a passion for teaching, ensuring personalized attention for each student. The school offers a range of courses, including Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, Airline Transport Pilot License, Instrument Rating, and various instructor ratings. Our facilities include fully air-conditioned classrooms, simulators, and the latest audio-visual aids, providing a conducive learning environment. With a focus on safety and broad-based training, Avel Flight School is committed to helping students achieve their aviation dreams efficiently and effectively. Join us to make your aviation aspirations a reality.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
